text: Valur Snjólfur Ingimundarson (born 20 February 1962) is an Icelandic former basketball player and coach. He played for 20 seasons in the Icelandic ÚrvalsdeildValur Ingimundarson - Stats and is its highest scoring player of all time.Heildartölfræði einstaklinga á úrvalsdeildarferlinum ==Denmark== Valur was a player-coach for Odense BK from 1995 to 1998 and helped the club achieve promotion up two levels in two seasons and to the Danish top-tier league in 1997. He left Odense after the 1997-1998 season and to over as head coach for Tindastóll. ==Icelandic national team== Valur is the second most capped player in the national team history, playing 164 games between 1980 and 1995. ==Team of the 20th century== In 2001 Valur was voted to the Icelandic team of the 20th century in basketball as a player.Lið aldarinnar hjá KKÍ tilkynnt í bikarúrslitaleikjunum á laugardaginn ==Personal life== Valur is the older brother of Sigurður Ingimundarson, the winningest coach in Icelandic basketball history,29\. leikurinn milli þjálfarabræðranna Vals og Sigurðar and the father of basketball player Valur Orri Valsson.Fjórtán ára í byrjunarliði Njarðvíkur ==References== ==External links== *Úrvalsdeild statistics at Icelandic Basketball Association Ingimundarson, Valur Ingimundarson, Valur Category:Icelandic basketball coaches Category:Icelandic men's basketball players Ingimundarson, Valur Category:Úrvalsdeild karla basketball coaches Category:Úrvalsdeild karla basketball players Category:Úrvalsdeild kvenna basketball coaches Category:Njarðvík men's basketball players Category:Njarðvík men's basketball coaches Category:Njarðvík women's basketball coaches Category:Skallagrímur men's basketball players Category:Skallagrímur men's basketball coaches Category:Tindastóll men's basketball players Category:Tindastóll men's basketball coaches
title: Valur Ingimundarson
